name: Scioness
description:
DESCRIPTION

Scioness is a 2d scrolling shooter where the player has to fight 3 bosses. Each boss features a unique attack style, and after each one is defeated the player is able to speak with them and learn more about the game's story.

SYPNOSIS

Set in a fantasy steampunk world. Lola Blackwood's mother is on the brink of death. Urgently she mentions to Lola about her father whom she never knew and insinuates that the king had killed him. Searching for answers she leaves with the intention to confront the king directly with a gun in hand. However, before she can get to him she has to face the king's battle-ready successors.

FEAUTURES AND CONTROLS

The player is able to initiate dialogue before and after each battle for 3 bosses. During combat, the player is able to aim with the mouse and shoot with left click with infinite ammo. Space is jump and the player can move left and right with A and D. W and S to choose dialogue replies. 

PRICE

Scioness is a free game due to it being my very first.
